Names of God.quote: The myriad names conceal the One infinite. (Zohar 1:1)

Divine Names.quote: "To Allah belong the best names, so invoke Him by them." (Quran 7:180)

Divine Titles.quote: "King of kings and Lord of lords." (Revelation 19:16)

Gods.quote: Ekam sat vipra bahudha vadanti â€“ Truth is one, the wise call it by many names. (Rig Veda 1.164.46)

Divine Identity.quote: "Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one." (Deuteronomy 6:4)

Divine Person.quote: The Divine Person, who is both immanent and transcendent, incarnates love in creation. (Thomas Aquinas, Summa Theologica 1:3)

Divine Aspects.quote: Infinite facets reveal the One. (Rig Veda 1.164.46)

Divine Attributes.quote: His attributes shine forth in creation. (Psalm 19:1)

Divine Powers.quote: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer. (Quran 2:255)

Divine Process.quote: "In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth." (Genesis 1:1)

Divine Game.quote: "The world is God's play - Lila." (Brahma Sutra 2.1.33)

Divine Forces.quote: The Tao gave birth to One, One gave birth to Two, Two gave birth to Three, and Three gave birth to all things. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 42)

Divine Nature.quote: "You may partake of the divine nature." (2 Peter 1:4)

Divine End.quote: "I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End." (Revelation 21:6)

Divine Formations.quote: The cosmos is fashioned by the divine Craftsman. (Plato, Timaeus)

Divine Reality.quote: "That thou art - Tat tvam asi." (Chandogya Upanishad 6.8.7)

Divine Concepts.quote: "The Tao that can be told is not the eternal Tao." (Tao Te Ching 1)

Divine Relationship.quote: "Abandon all dharmas and take refuge in Me alone." (Bhagavad Gita 18:66)

Grades of God.quote: "From the lowest to the highest, all are manifestations of the One." (Ramakrishna)

Divine Symbols.quote: "Om is the imperishable word; Om is the universe." (Mandukya Upanishad 1)

Divine Knowledge.quote: "The knowledge of God is the knowledge of all things." (Ibn Arabi, Fusus al-Hikam)

Divine Parts.quote: "He dwells in all beings as the Self of all." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 2.5.19)

Divine Play.quote: "The entire universe is the Lord's divine play." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Divine Representation.quote: "He is the image of the invisible God." (Colossians 1:15)

Divine Manifestation.quote: "Whenever righteousness declines, I manifest Myself." (Bhagavad Gita 4:7)

Divine Practices.quote: "Whatever you do, offer it to Me as an offering." (Bhagavad Gita 9:27)

Divine Domains.quote: "The earth is the Lord's, and everything in it." (Psalm 24:1)
